tests.fixtures.app

Class FixtureAppGeneralConfigurationStylesheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • fit.Fixture
      • fit.ActionFixture
        • tests.fixtures.app.FixtureApp
          • tests.fixtures.app.FixtureAppGeneralConfigurationStylesheet

  • public class FixtureAppGeneralConfigurationStylesheet
extends FixtureApp
    Implements the fixtures for testing the pop-menu for the style sheet files in DlgConfigGeneral dialog.

    0.1
    Author:
    Ren√© Majewski
